text:
Currently, searching for "python oauth2" doesn't show up on the first 5 pages of Google. I only came across this wonderful project after reading another obscure article from 2012, mentioning that this project was still in beta. Amusingly, the pypi package for this library is the first result for "python oauth", though it would be better if it was the Github page.

In an attempt to reach more developers via Google, I'd like to propose the following;
- Rename repo to "python-oauthlib"
- Modify README to include "Python" in the headers and text
- Modify README to include "oauth2" in the text

Thoughts?
title: SEO improvement

text: @ib-lundgren Are you yay or nay on this one? I can easily put together a PR for this, but it will require someone with ownership to setup redirects and such.
